overview: The young and horny college studs in ‘Making The Grade’ know that the best way to avoid getting a D is by secretly servicing their horny professor’s D. Award-winning director Steve Cruz and a cast of nine hung and horny daddies and twinks dive deep into college life where these resourceful students dick-tate the terms with their older professors and coaches, using intense bareback action to get exactly what they want.
title: Making the Grade
